title: Tong Tong - You You no Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: Tong Tong (based on a real panda at Ueno Zoo of the same name who became the first giant panda to successfully be birthed in captivity Japan) and You You (Tong Tong's male sibling born 2 years after her) decide to go out of the house and into the city without their parents to meet their friend Mori (who is with his dad). They end up learning traffic safety from a helpful police woman who gets them to their destination safely.
related_anime: ['Tong Tong - You You no Hi no Youjin']
